description:
Tired paddlers in your group? Not a problem with this 5m long dynamic rope, so you can be the hero at a moments notice.

  • 5m length with 24% elongation and a 320kg breaking strength for durability
  • Quick release waist belt with shock leash system makes towing comfortable
  • Expandable bag for a quick and easy release and packing
name: Level Six Tow Line
